sys_ux_macroponent.required_translations:
[ { "message" : "
DOD Information System for Security(Visit Requests) - formerly JPAS
 

Submitting a Visit Requests Visit Access Request(VAR)

Click 'New item' below to request a Visit Requests VAR.  With the submission of this form you are requesting that your eligibility (clearance) and access be sent to an outside organization.

Requests need to be submitted five (5) days prior to the day of the visit. If the visit request falls inside the five day window please contact the POCs listed after entering the below request.​​

When submitting visit request, you are required to provide all of the following:

  • Security Management Office (SMO) Code at the Hosting Location: 
    • If you are going to a non-DoD agency that does not use Visit Requests input “PLA” and submit to SSO.
  • Visit Name (20 Character Limit):
    • Example: ARL/SOCOM/XYZ Conf.
  • Dates of Visit (First and Last Date): 
    • If the visit needs to be PERM CERT'ed please input the last day of the visit as no later than 1 year from the first day of the visit.)
  • Overall Access Level for the Event (e.g. Unclass, Secret, TS, SCI):
  • Reason for Visit (Meeting, Conference, Training, etc):
  • Technical POC Name (First and Last Name):
  • Technical POC Phone Number​​:
  • Technical POC Email:
  • Visitor(s) Attending: List email address for all of attendees.

My Visit Access Request

", "comment" : "" }, { "message" : "All Requests", "comment" : "" }, { "message" : "new item", "comment" : "" } ]
